Package org.opendaylight.controller.northbound.commons.exception

Provides the necessary class that represent exception in REST API.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommonsNorthboundExceptionTest  
    GenericExceptionMapper  
    MethodNotAllowed
    Implementation of StatusType for error 405 as in: http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.4.6
    NotImplemented
    Implementation of StatusType for error 501 as in: http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.4.6
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadRequestException
    Status Code 400 (Bad Request) The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.
    InternalServerErrorException
    Status Code 500 (Internal Server Error) The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.
    MethodNotAllowedException
    Status Code 405 (Method Not Allowed) The method specified in the Request-Line is not allowed for the resource identified by the Request-URI.
    NotAcceptableException
    Status Code 406 (Not Acceptable) The resource identified by the request is only capable of generating response entities which have content characteristics not acceptable according to the accept headers sent in the request.
    NotImplementedException
    Status Code 501 (Not Implemented) The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.
    ResourceConflictException
    Status Code 409 (Conflict) The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.
    ResourceForbiddenException
    Status Code 403 (Forbidden) The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.
    ResourceGoneException
    Status Code 410 (Gone) The requested resource is no longer available at the server and no forwarding address is known.
    ResourceNotFoundException
    Status Code 404 (Not Found) The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.
    ServiceUnavailableException
    Status Code 503 (Service Unavailable Error) The server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.
    UnauthorizedException
    Status Code 401 (Unauthorized) The request requires user authentication.
    UnsupportedMediaTypeException
    Status Code 415 (Unsupported Media Type) The server is refusing to service the request because the entity of the request is in a format not supported by the requested resource for the requested method.

Package org.opendaylight.controller.northbound.commons.exception Description

Provides the necessary class that represent exception in REST API.
